name: Claustrum
description:
An atmospheric exploration game with horror elements

It's the future! Spacestation has gone dark and no-one knows why. You are sent in to investigate. Find out what has happened by collecting samples and while you're there, fix up the place with your blowtorch.

(For those who seek extra challenge, try to get an S rank)

Controls:

Arrow keys - Move, aim, go through doors
Z - Action
X - Inventory

Holding down Z-button lets you aim without going through doors.

Game was made in 2020's LOWREZJAM by Simo Kauppinen
Gameplay Music by Rami Airola

(Note about the lack of HTML5-version: I found out the day before release that Clickteam Fusion's HTML-exporter doesn't support layer effects, and unfortunately game doesn't work without it.)
